Reference

Arrow file creation

Functions that help create / set up an ArrowFile

createArrowFiles()

Create Arrow Files

filterCells()

Filter cells in an ArchRProject

filterDoublets()

Filter Doublets From an ArchR Project

filterPlot()

Filter Plot for cells in an ArchRProject

nCells()

Get number of cells from ArchRProject/ArrowFile

Add-ers

Functions that add information to ArrowFiles or an ArchRProject

addCNVMatrix()

Add TileMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addCellColData()

Add information to cellColData in an ArchRProject

addClusters()

This function will identify clusters for single cell reduced dimensions supplied or from and ArchRProject

addCoAccessibility()

Add Peak Co-Accessibility to ArchR Project

addDemuxletResults()

Add Demuxlet Results to ArchR Project

addDeviationsMatrix()

Add DeviationsMatrix to Arrow Files in ArchRProject

addDoubletScores()

Add Doublet Scores to a collection of Arrow files or an ArchRProject

addEmbedding()

Add embedding of a reduced dimensions object in an ArchRProject

addFeatureMatrix()

Add FeatureMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addGeneScoreMatrix()

Add GeneScoreMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addGroupCoverages()

Add Group Coverages to ArchR Project

addImputeWeights()

Add TileMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addIterativeLSI()

Compute Iterative LSI

addMotifAnnotations()

Add motif annotations to an ArchRProject

addPeakMatrix()

Add PeakMatrix to Arrows in ArchRProject

addPeakSet()

Add a peak set to an ArchRProject

addProjectSummary()

Add projectSummary tp ArchRProject

addReproduciblePeakSet()

Add Reproducible Peak Set to ArchR Project

addSampleColData()

Add information to sampleColData to an ArchRProject

addSeqLengths()

Add Seqlengths to genomic ranges

addTileMatrix()

Add TileMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addTrajectory()

Add Supervised Trajectory to an ArchR Project

Get-ers

Functions that get information from ArrowFiles or an ArchRProject

getAnnotation()

Get annotation from an ArchRProject

getArrowFiles()

Get ArrowFiles from an ArchRProject

getBlacklist()

Get blacklist from an ArchRProject

getCellColData()

Get cellColData from an ArchRProject

getCellNames()

Get cellNames from an ArchRProject

getChromLengths()

Get chromLengths from ArchRProject

getChromSizes()

Get chromSizes from ArchRProject

getEmbedding()

Get embedding information stored in an ArchRProject

getExons()

Get the exons from an ArchRProject

getFeatures()

Return the available features that could be selected from a given data matrix within an ArchRProject

getFragmentsFromArrow()

Get the fragments from an ArrowFile

getGeneAnnotation()

Get geneAnnotation from an ArchRProject

getGenes()

Get the genes from an ArchRProject

getGenome()

Get the genome used by an ArchRProject

getGenomeAnnotation()

Get genomeAnnotation from an ArchRProject

getImputeWeights()

Get outputDirectory in ArchRProject

getInputFiles()

Get Input Files from paths to create arrows

getMatches()

Get annotation matches from an ArchRProject

getMatrixFromArrow()

Get a data matrix stored in an ArrowFile

getOutputDirectory()

Get outputDirectory from an ArchRProject

getPeakSet()

Get the peak set from an ArchRProject

getPositions()

Get annotation positions from an ArchRProject

getProjectSummary()

Get projectSummary from ArchRProject

getReducedDims()

Get dimensionality reduction information stored in an ArchRProject

getSampleColData()

Get sampleColData from an ArchRProject

getSampleNames()

Get sampleNames from an ArchRProject

getTSS()

Get the transcription start sites of all genes in an ArchRProject

getTrajectory()

Get Supervised Trajectory from an ArchR Project

getTutorialData()

Get Tutorial Data For ArchR

getValidBarcodes()

Get Valid Barcodes from 10x Cell Ranger output to pre-filter barcodes

Plotting / aesthetic functions

Functions for plotting in ArchR

ArchRRegionTrack()

Plot ArchR Region Track

ggAlignPlots()

Align Ggplots vertically or horizontally

ggHex()

Ggplot Hexplot summary of points in a standardized manner

ggOneToOne()

A ggplot-based one-to-one dot plot

ggPoint()

A ggplot-based dot plot

ggViolin()

GG Violin Plot

paletteContinuous()

Continuous Color Palette

paletteDiscrete()

Optimized discrete color palette generation

plotEmbedding()

Visualize Embedding from ArchR Project

plotFootprints()

Plot footprints for an ArchRProject

plotGroups()

Visualize Groups from ArchR Project

plotPDF()

Plot PDF in outputDirectory of an ArchRProject

plotTrajectory()

Visualize Embedding from ArchR Project

theme_ArchR()

ggplot2 default theme for ArchR
